statements: DELETE FROM citizenship_exam_answers WHERE question_id = 1 AND answer_text = 'Option A';
DELETE FROM citizenship_exam_questions WHERE question_id = (SELECT question_id FROM citizenship_exam_answers WHERE answer_text = 'Option B');
DELETE FROM exam_questions WHERE question_text = 'What is the capital of France?';
DELETE FROM Citizenship_Exam_Answers WHERE is_correct = FALSE;
DELETE FROM exam_answers WHERE is_correct = FALSE AND question_id = 2;
DELETE FROM exam_answers WHERE is_correct = FALSE;
